content.rendered:
A bachelor’s degree is a game changer.

It can expand your career options, boost your lifetime earning potential, and put you on the path to upward mobility.

At the University of La Verne, our undergraduate curriculum focuses heavily on hands-on learning experiences and the crucial professional skills that you’ll need to become a success in the workplace and a leader in your community.
